-- creating raw external data source

create external data source nyc_taxi_data_raw
    with
         (
             location='abfss://my-taxi-data@synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
         )

select name,location from sys.external_data_sources

drop external data source nyc_taxi_data_raw

select 
     * 
from    
    openrowset(
                BULK 'calendar.csv',
                data_source='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                format='csv',
                header_row=TRUE,
                parser_version='2.0'
            )as cal
